fields.description:
Testing Slider I encountered the app crash after navigating to the previouse view, using nav bar.

Test steps:
1. Install and run KS> Base UI> Slider> Basic
2. Click Slider in the nav bar

Actual result:
Crash

Expected:
No crash
fields.summary: iOS7: Slider-Basic - crash navigating between views, using nav bar
